text: Kapena inu mumaganiza kuti mukalowa ku Paradiso popanda kuyesedwa monga momwe anthu amene analipo kale anaona? Iwo anapeza mavuto ndi masautso ochuluka ndipo anada nkhawa moti Mtumwi pamodzi ndi iwo amene adakhulupirira ndi iye adati: “Kodi chithandizo cha Mulungu chidzadza liti? Inde! Ndithudi, chithandizo cha Mulungu tsopano chili pafupi.”
